text.div:
Viral Hemorrhagic Fever (Tests for Viral Hemorrhagic Fever Virus IgG Antibody)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    22377-6 Lassa virus IgG Ab [Presence] in Serum
    22378-4 Lassa virus IgG Ab [Titer] in Serum
    31452-6 Lassa virus IgG Ab [Units/volume] in Serum
    71707-4 Marburg virus IgG Ab [Titer] in Serum by Immunoassay
    71710-8 Lassa virus IgG Ab [Titer] in Serum by Immunoassay
    71767-8 Ebola virus IgG Ab [Titer] in Serum by Immunoassay
    71769-4 Marburg virus IgG Ab [Presence] in Serum by Immunoassay
    71770-2 Ebola virus IgG Ab [Presence] in Serum by Immunoassay
    7942-6 Lassa virus IgG Ab [Presence] in Serum by Immunoassay

    88191-2 Crimean-Congo hemorrhagic fever virus IgG Ab [Presence] in Serum by Immunoassay
